definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: These ignition wires send the charge to each spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 这些点火导线将电荷运送至每个火花塞。

sentences.english: The result was the plug-spark as we know it today.
sentences.chinese: 结果便发明了我们今天所熟知的那种火花塞。
火花塞和加工保留螺母。

sentences.english: The spark plugs are from stainless steel with a corian insulator.
sentences.chinese: 火花塞是由不锈钢与可丽耐绝缘子。

sentences.english: The inspection preheats sparking plug condition.
Furiously he tested the spark-plugs, stared at the commutator .
sentences.chinese: 他气呼呼地测试着火花塞，眼睛盯着转换器。

sentences.english: The loose bearing may generally be isolated by shorting spark plugs .
sentences.chinese: 轴承松动的征状通常可能会被短路的火花塞孤立出来。

sentences.english: Turning off the ignition de-energizes the spark plugs.
sentences.chinese: 关掉点火装置就切断了火花塞的电源。

sentences.english: All readings are taken on each firing of the spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 所有数据都在采取每一个射击的火花塞。

sentences.english: The result was the spark-plug as we know it today.
sentences.chinese: 结果便发明了我们今天熟知的火花塞。

sentences.english: Machining the spark plug hole and counter bore at a compound angle.
sentences.chinese: 加工火花塞孔与反孔的复合角度。

sentences.english: The team is in discussions with a spark plug manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 该团队正在与一家火花塞生产商接触。

sentences.english: Disconnect the cable from the spark plug and unscrew the spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 断开连于火花塞的缆线并旋下火花塞。

sentences.english: Disconnect the cable from the spark plug and unscrew the spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 断开连于火花塞的缆线并旋下火花塞。

definition: cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
